rows.label: qev086002_MSG0001
rows.name:
Huh? Transmission loss in this sector's supply system?
No... I didn't notice anything particularly wrong, but[ST:wide ]—

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0002
rows.name:
But it's in the readings!
Please, you have to check one more time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0003
rows.name:
Somehow, it's a difficult conversation and
Tatsu doesn't understand well, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0004
rows.name:
NLA was originally
the residential block of a spaceship, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0005
rows.name: We're standing in what was the outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0006
rows.name:
Energy from the main engine that was supposed to go
to the now-unneeded attitude control thrusters[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0007
rows.name: The energy from the main engines[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0008
rows.name: Basically, it's like there's a water leak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0009
rows.name:
Lin plugged it up before, but
it started leaking again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0010
rows.name:
I see-meh!
Finally, Tatsu gets it-meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0012
rows.name: What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0013
rows.name:
Come to think of it, it's been a while since
I've seen Lin doing mechanic work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0014
rows.name: Is it unusual?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev086002_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask for more details about Lin.

rows.label: qev086002_JNK0020
rows.name: Interest

rows.label: qev086002_SEL0021
rows.name: Watch Lin work, noticing she seems to be enjoying it.

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0015
rows.name:
Originally, Lin was primarily a mechanic.
So, if anything[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0016
rows.name:
Her current situation, fighting as BLADE,
is more like she's pushing herself for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0017
rows.name: She looks like she's having fun, doesn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0018
rows.name:
Because Lin is a smart kid,
she understands what it means to live on Mira, so[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0018_2
rows.name:
The different parts we all need to play
for us to survive on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0019
rows.name:
Maybe she's happier being able to use
her talents in this way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0020
rows.name:
You see, Lin[ST:wide ]—Even on the White Whale,
she was part of the engine section's maintenance crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0021
rows.name:
When the White Whale crashed onto Mira, she stayed by the main engines
until the very last moment, continuing maintenance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even though she's young, she is undeniably
a trustworthy mechanic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0023
rows.name:
If Lin senses something's wrong,
then there's definitely a problem with this sector's equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0024
rows.name:
I've identified the problem!
It seems to be an issue with the replacement part's precision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0025
rows.name: The part you replaced last time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0026
rows.name:
Yes[ST:wide ]—
It was a part manufactured here in NLA, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0027
rows.name:
As expected, compared to the Earth-made parts used on the White Whale,
the quality seems to be lower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0028
rows.name: That can't be helped, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0029
rows.name:
But, if we go to Meteor Valley,
we might find parts that are still usable[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0030
rows.name:
If Lin-san says so, let's go right away-meh!
Let's finish this job quickly and have dinner-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0031
rows.name:
Right.
Let's finish this before Tatsu collapses.[ST:wait ]
